<% occurrences.forEach(function(occurrence) { %> <div class="d-flex justify-content-between occurrence <%= occurrence.type %>">
<%= occurrence.formattedDate %> <% if(occurrence.type === "start") { %> <%= localization.recurrenceStart %> <% } %> <% if(occurrence.type === "rdate") { %> <%= localization.additionalDate %> <% } %>
<% if(!readOnly) { %>
<% if(occurrence.type === "rrule") { %> <button type="button" date="<%= occurrence.date %>" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary <%= occurrence.type %>" title="<%= localization.exclude %>"> <%= icons.exclude %>
<% } %> <% if(occurrence.type === "rdate") { %> <button type="button" date="<%= occurrence.date %>" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary <%= occurrence.type %>" title="<%= localization.remove %>"> <%= icons.remove %>
<% } %> <% if(occurrence.type === "exdate") { %> <button type="button" date="<%= occurrence.date %>" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary <%= occurrence.type %>" title="<%= localization.include %>"> <%= icons.include %>
<% } %>
<% } %>

<% for(var index=0; index < batch.batches.length; index++) { %> <span <% if(index === batch.currentBatch) { %>class="current"<% } %>> <a href="#" start="<%= batch.batches[index][0] %>">[<%= batch.batches[index][0] %> - <%= batch.batches[index][1] %>]
<% } %>
